mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, login_id, password, name, phone, valid_from, valid_to, birth_date, address, email, branch_id, rank_id )VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{login_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{valid_from}, #{valid_to}, #{birth_date}, #{address}, #{email}, #{branch_id}, #{rank_id} )
